courseInfo.subject: English Communication - NESMA Intensive Program
courseInfo.description: Intensive 4-week English communication program designed to advance students from Level 1 to Level 2 proficiency. Focuses on foundational English basics, pronunciation enhancement through targeted phonics work, and practical communication skills for vocational contexts.
courseInfo.methodology: Intensive communicative approach with targeted phonics for pronunciation improvement
courseInfo.target_audience: NESMA vocational students progressing from elementary to pre-intermediate level (A1â†’A2 ESL)
courseInfo.learning_outcome: Students will advance from Level 1 (elementary) to Level 2 (pre-intermediate) English proficiency

units.title: Foundations and Phonics Introduction
units.description: Introduction to Jolly Phonics and vocabulary building
objectives: Create simple stories using learned vocabulary

dailyPlans.activities: Introduced Group 1 of Jolly Phonics (s, a, t, i, p, n). PowerPoint vocabulary presentation that forms a coherent story. Students practiced letter sounds and recognition.
dailyPlans.notes: First class - students engaged well with phonics sounds. Story-based vocabulary helped with retention.

units.title: Phonics Expansion & Communication Skills
units.description: Expanding phonics knowledge and building communication abilities
objectives: Master Groups 2, 3, and 4 of Jolly Phonics

dailyPlans.activities: Revision of Group 1 phonics. Introduction to Group 2 of Jolly Phonics (c, k, e, h, r, m, d). PowerPoint vocabulary presentation without story (story planned for next session). Getting to know students better through interactive activities.
Creating the story from previous session's vocabulary. Introduction to Group 3 of Jolly Phonics (g, o, u, l, f, b). Interactive phonics quiz for practice and assessment. Parts of speech introduction.
Group 4 Jolly Phonics introduction and practice (ai, j, oa, ie, ee, or). Phonics practice session. Additional content development and reinforcement activities.

units.title: Advanced Phonics & Communication Practice
units.description: Consolidating phonics skills and expanding communication abilities

dailyPlans.activities: Introduction to remaining Jolly Phonics groups. Integration exercises combining phonics with vocabulary building.
Speaking activities using learned phonics patterns. Basic conversation practice with emphasis on pronunciation.
Simple reading exercises using phonics knowledge. Basic writing practice with learned vocabulary.

units.title: Integration & Assessment
units.description: Final integration of all learned skills and comprehensive assessment

dailyPlans.activities: Complete review of all Jolly Phonics groups. Comprehensive vocabulary and pronunciation practice.
Speaking assessment using learned materials. Demonstration of communication skills improvement.
Course wrap-up and review of progress. Planning for Level 2 English progression. Feedback and next steps.
